# cmccloudv2_iam_custom_role (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create a custom role
resource "cmccloudv2_iam_custom_role" "cr-tf" {
	name        = "cr-tf"
	description = "custom role from terraform"
	content     = file("${path.module}/customrole.json")
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String) The json content of custom role policy.
- `name` (String) The name of the custom role

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the custom role
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created` (String) The created time of the custom role
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
